p.span: Pre-K and Kinder registration packets due back by May 1st!

a.title: Go to comments for Pre-K/Kinder Registration Info

p.span: Governor Abbott has closed public schools for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year. He announced that Commissioner Morath will give directions in closing out the school year and options for graduation.
More to come in the very near future.

a.title: Go to comments for School Closures

p.span: Your input is important to us. Please useTHIS FORMto submit inquiries and comments.

a.title: Go to comments for Community Form

p.span: The Ganado FCA Glow Run has been postponed. More information to come.

a.title: Go to comments for Glow Run

p.span: GISD Schools will remain closed through Friday, May 1st. Click HERE to read Dr. Hardwick's letter to the district.

a.title: Go to comments for GISD School Closures

p.span: Please click on one of the School Lunch Survey links to participate in the school lunch program. The survey is to provide the district numbers in order to know how many meals to prepare. Thank you!

a.title: Go to comments for School Lunch Survey

div.span: This link provides free internet service during

a.title: Go to comments for Helpful Links for Students and Parents

p.span: Ganado ISD cafeteria will begin providing meals for pick-up (breakfast/lunch combo) starting Tuesday, March 24 at 9:30 am. Pick up line will begin at the rear door of the cafeteria adjacent to the elementary drive through area. Meals will be delivered to your vehicle.
If you do not have transportation and need a meal to be delivered to a student please contact 771-4250.

a.title: Go to comments for GISD Cafeteria

p.span: Here is the most recent communication regarding GISD school closures. Please click HERE for information.

a.title: Go to comments for Updated Info Regarding School Closures
